name: SeoEaze
description:
SeoEaze is a Digital Marketing Company providing Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing & PPC Services to Clients worldwide, mainly to US, UK, Australia & India. Founded in the year 2009, SeoEaze has its offices in India and US, providing top notch services to all its clients. 
The company has served all types of businesses be it small or big. Their customer care is liked by all their clients as they give due importance to the client's needs and requirements. The forte of this company is to deal in services like:
Search engine optimization
Website design and development
PPC
Link building
Social media marketing
Content creation
and more
